texto: 4.3 Tailored conformance When this document is used as a basis for establishing a set of processes that do not qualify for full conformance, the clauses of this document are selected or modified in accordance with the tailoring process prescribed in Annex A. The tailored text, for which tailored conformance is claimed, is declared. Tailored conformance is achieved by demonstrating that the outcomes, activities, and tasks, as tailored, have been achieved. 12 © ISO/IEC 2017 – All rights reserved © IEEE 2017 – All rights reserved Authorized licensed use limited to: Burapha University provided by UniNet.
